Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can oxidize diverse fuels by harnessing oxygen ions.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: Benefited by this feature, direct utilization of hydrocarbon fuels without external reformers allows for cost-effective realization of SOFC systems.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: Superior hydrocarbon reforming catalysts such as nickel are required for this application.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: However, carbon coking on nickel-based anodes and the low efficiency associated with hydrocarbon fueling relegate these systems to immature technologies.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: Herein, we present methane fueled SOFCs operated under conditions of catalytic partial oxidation (CPDX).
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: Utilizing CPDX eliminates carbon coking on Ni and facilitates the oxidation of methane.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: Ni-gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC) anode-based cells exhibit exceptional power densities of 1.35 W cm(-2) at 650 C and 0.74 W cm(-2) at 550 degrees C, with stable operation over 500 h, while the similarly prepared Ni-yttria stabilized zirconia anode based cells exhibit a power density of 0.27 W cm(-2) at 650 degrees C, showing gradual degradation.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: Chemical analyses suggest that combining GDC with the Ni anode prevents the oxidation of Ni due to the oxygen exchange ability of GDC.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: In addition, CPDX operation allows the usage of stainless steel current collectors.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes

Sentencas: Our results demonstrate that high-performance SOFCs utilizing methane CPDX can be realized without deterioration of Ni-based anodes using cost-effective current collectors.
Titulo: Direct methane solid oxide fuel cells based on catalytic partial oxidation enabling complete coking tolerance of Ni-based anodes
